<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Argument handling is mostly uniform between the four places that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// make these decisions: function formal arguments, call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction args, call instruction returns and function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// returns. However, once a decision has been made on where an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// argument should go, exactly what happens can vary slightly. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// class abstracts the differences.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ValueAssigner should not depend on any specific function state, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// only determine the types and locations for arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/valueassigner"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/valueassigner/#a356248ea0464de7b7fa769e23aa0690c">ValueAssigner</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// stack-based object. This is either based on a FrameIndex or</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Lower the given call instruction, including argument and return value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// marshalling.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p CI is the call/invoke instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p ResRegs are the registers where the call&#39;s return value should be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stored (or 0 if there is no return value). There will be one register for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// each non-aggregate type, as returned by \\c computeValueLLTs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p ArgRegs is a list of lists of virtual registers containing each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// argument that needs to be passed (argument \\c i should be placed in \\c</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ArgRegs&#91;i&#93;). For each argument, there will be one register for each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// non-aggregate type, as returned by \\c computeValueLLTs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p SwiftErrorVReg is non-zero if the call has a swifterror inout</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// parameter, and contains the vreg that the swifterror should be copied into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// after the call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p GetCalleeReg is a callback to materialize a register for the callee if</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// CI. This might be because \\p CI is indirect, or because of the limited</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// range of an immediate jump.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return true if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calllowering/#af40849adf5cf5ed971196ae2c248b7e1">lowerCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIRBuilder, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">                 std::optional&lt;PtrAuthInfo&gt; PAI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ConvergenceCtrlToken,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For targets which want to use big-endian can enable it with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// enableBigEndian() hook</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calllowering/#ab09021a3db4bc5a91084e88939e4b337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calllowering/#ab09021a3db4bc5a91084e88939e4b337">enableBigEndian</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For targets which support the &quot;returned&quot; parameter attribute, returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
